attributes.action: Ban the use of unnecessary plastic packaging.
attributes.additional_details:
Follow below link for reference to image.

https://www.google.co.uk/search?q=orange+in+plastic+meme&client=ms-android-huawei&prmd=ivsn&tbm=isch&tbo=u&source=univ&fir=Vopmoq8_hPwa6M%253A%252CYD9VzLs-tUI6jM%252C_%253Bk_qOdyNqjm6xiM%253A%252ClH8zmIRtp3aF_M%252C_%253Ba2CQHKM7KCdxYM%253A%252C98D0LESbiPjOjM%252C_%253B3bJE5S8Oj_Q4rM%253A%252CzX6fqRO_CuJKiM%252C_%253BlNve6t1z6CF-YM%253A%252Cp3aYQ9KYHJPwPM%252C_%253B7SbMAQWXbzZKhM%253A%252CJ84NuAtQPIocrM%252C_%253BOGgy1pd_svEuMM%253A%252CYD9VzLs-tUI6jM%252C_%253B_TFvWAdTFiWCHM%253A%252C4LIR7U-uTIzzfM%252C_%253Bue0vMIUj-NrqJM%253A%252CJ6ZMNWfJNLw55M%252C_%253BENmjm3uo-o0zZM%253A%252C4LIR7U-uTIzzfM%252C_&usg=AI4_-kRWIbUQAYObl6jKwSbiEp-9i0Vi3A&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiD0Nz3k9vfAhUHQhUIHWs3DVQQ7Al6BAgKEBo&biw=360&bih=560
attributes.background:
There is an image circling the internet with a pre peeled orange in a plastic packaging to keep it fresh. This is unnecessary because unpeeled kranges will keep themselves fresh without the use of harmful plastic.

I propose that this type of practice is made  illigal to help save the environment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure whether you would like to introduce laws about pre-prepared fruit and vegetables or about plastics.

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232684
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231235

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
